meta.name: GitHub Code Reviewer
meta.description: A code review agent that is customized for your GitHub repositories.

files.AGENTS.md:
Assist the user in developing an agent.

- Use AI SDK v5 for tool-call syntax (inputSchema instead of parameters).
- Store local environment secrets in .env.local.
- Store production environment secrets in .env.production.
- Run "blink deploy" to deploy an agent to the cloud.
- Run "blink deploy --prod" to deploy to production.
- The user can run "blink dev" to start a development server.
files..gitignore:
# dependencies
node_modules

# config and build
.blink

# dotenv environment variables file
.env
.env.*

# Finder (MacOS) folder config
.DS_Store
files.tsconfig.json:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "lib": ["ESNext"],
    "target": "ESNext",
    "module": "Preserve",
    "moduleDetection": "force",

    "moduleResolution": "bundler",
    "allowImportingTsExtensions": true,
    "verbatimModuleSyntax": true,
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "noEmit": true,

    "strict": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "noFallthroughCasesInSwitch": true,
    "noUncheckedIndexedAccess": true,
    "noImplicitOverride": true,

    "noUnusedLocals": false,
    "noUnusedParameters": false,

    "types": ["node"]
  }
}

meta.name: Scratch
meta.description: A blank canvas for your agent. Use this to build your own agent.
